name: part_004
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2023】3Dバラエティ！あびゃびゃ！全国おいしい発見！～高級食材で牛丼づくりに挑む～【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [Si2W-gcT1Lw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: The studio hosts discuss the quiz answers and Pekora and Noel decide to bet their mascot figures ('Danyin') on their answers.
VTR reveals the correct answer to the quiz question about Tajirigo's offspring.
Studio reaction to the answer. Everyone lost, and the mascot figures are confiscated.
VTR segment: Noel visits Nikudokoro Tatsuki and observes a professional butcher slicing high-quality Tajima beef.

subtitles.original: 田尻号さんでしたっけ？
subtitles.english: Was it Tajirigo-san?

subtitles.original: はい。もういくつもの雌牛とさ、いろいろとさ、やってるかもしれないけど…
subtitles.english: Yes. He might have been active with many cows and such, but...

subtitles.original: そうですよ。数えられるわけなくね？普通に。
subtitles.english: That's right. There's no way you can count them, right? Normally.

subtitles.original: ちゅうことは無限しかないの！誰も数えられないからじゃあ無限にしましょうか。
subtitles.english: That means it can only be infinity! Since no one can count them, let's go with infinity.

subtitles.original: お前団員賭けろもうそれ。
subtitles.english: You should bet your "Danyin" on that.

subtitles.original: 行くしかねぇよ。／団員賭けよう。／賭けようぜぺこら。／します？
subtitles.english: There's no other way. / Let's bet the "Danyin". / Let's bet, Pekora. / Will you do it?

subtitles.original: わかったよ…団員…
subtitles.english: Alright... "Danyin"...

subtitles.original: MAX2行く！
subtitles.english: Going with the maximum of 2!

subtitles.original: 行くしかねぇよ！／すごーい！／マジですげー！
subtitles.english: You have to go for it! / Amazing! / That's really amazing!

subtitles.original: こいつら賭けて。え、×2なんだよね？正解したら。
subtitles.english: I'm betting these guys. It'll be doubled, right? If I get it right.

subtitles.original: そうですよ。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: 行け無限！じゃあ行きましょうか。
subtitles.english: Go infinity! Well then, shall we proceed?

subtitles.original: それではあとはマリンですね。マリンの回答は？
subtitles.english: Now, only Marine is left. What is Marine's answer?

subtitles.original: マリンの回答これね、ちょっとパッと見380頭に見えるんですけど、よくよく見ると無限なんですね。
subtitles.english: This is Marine's answer. It might look like 380 at a glance, but if you look closely, it's infinity.

subtitles.original: なんで380の80にしたぺこの？
subtitles.english: Why did you turn the 8 of 380 into an 80, Peko?

subtitles.original: え、これは…13…ちょっと待って。ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Uh, this is... 13... wait a minute. Wait a minute.

subtitles.original: そんなこといちいち聞くんじゃないでしょう？
subtitles.english: You shouldn't ask that every single time, right?

subtitles.original: お前もBETするんだよな！ぺこらにも懸けた。BETするよな？380頭でBETするよな！？
subtitles.english: You're going to bet too, aren't you! You challenged Pekora. You'll bet, right? Bet with 380, right!?

subtitles.original: まぁ一旦いいか、一旦。
subtitles.english: No, well, for now it's fine, for now.

subtitles.original: ふざけるなよ！一旦いいかって。BETはしないということで。
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me! What do you mean "for now it's fine"? So you're not betting.

subtitles.original: 最初の問題でいきなりBETする奴ってバカですよね。
subtitles.english: Anyone who bets right on the first question is an idiot, right?

subtitles.original: お前吹っ掛けてきただろう！ふざけるな！2体使ってでもMAXなんだよこいつら！
subtitles.english: You were the one who suggested it! Don't mess with me! I'm using two of them, and it's their max!

subtitles.original: でも自信あるんでしょ？
subtitles.english: But you're confident, right?

subtitles.original: まぁ自信あるわ。
subtitles.english: Well, I am.

subtitles.original: じゃあまぁ皆さん最後に団長の答えを見ていきましょう。／こちら！
subtitles.english: Well then, everyone, let's see the Captain's answer last. / This one!

subtitles.original: 牛丼だ！「おにくおいしい」頭です。
subtitles.english: It's a beef bowl! It's "Meat is delicious" heads.

subtitles.original: まぁまぁまぁまぁ、いいですね。熱量が。
subtitles.english: Well, well, well, it's fine. The passion...

subtitles.original: これに関しては団長答え知らない…
subtitles.english: Regarding this, the Captain doesn't know the answer...

subtitles.original: ええ？聞いてないの？そういうパターンもあるんだ。
subtitles.english: Eh? You haven't heard? There are patterns like that too.

subtitles.original: ちなみにんなんですけど団長、BETはしますか？
subtitles.english: By the way, Captain, will you bet?

subtitles.original: でも団員さんの顔見たい！見たいからちょっと…
subtitles.english: But I want to see the "Danyin's" face! I want to see it, so...

subtitles.original: はい、1匹ちょっと見たいな。1匹BETさせてもらうね。
subtitles.english: Yes, I want to see one. I'll let one of them bet.

subtitles.original: オーケイでございますよ。さよなら団員さん。
subtitles.english: Understood. Goodbye, "Danyin"-san.

subtitles.original: さぁそれでは皆さん、正解した方はいらっしゃるんでしょうか。
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, is there anyone who got it right?

subtitles.original: それでは正解を発表します。こちらです！
subtitles.english: Now, I will announce the answer. It's this!

subtitles.original: 13年間でなんと、約1500頭！
subtitles.english: In 13 years, amazingly, approximately 1500 heads!

subtitles.original: すごい！もっといたんだけど！
subtitles.english: Amazing! I thought there were more!

subtitles.original: 田尻号が自然交配でなんと1500頭ほど子孫を残してくれたというね。
subtitles.english: Tajirigo left behind about 1500 offspring through natural mating.

subtitles.original: 約1500だよ？無限と同じじゃないですか！
subtitles.english: It's approx 1500, right? Isn't it the same as infinity!?

subtitles.original: 司会者権限でどうぺこですかこれは？
subtitles.english: As the MC, what's the verdict on this, Peko?

subtitles.original: 残念ながらでございます。
subtitles.english: Unfortunately, you're wrong.

subtitles.original: 思考放棄、思考放棄～
subtitles.english: Thought abandonment, thought abandonment~

subtitles.original: 全員不正解、0ptです！
subtitles.english: Everyone is wrong, 0 points!

subtitles.original: 没収しないで！
subtitles.english: Don't confiscate them!

subtitles.original: ぺこら選手、そしてノエル団長の団員さんは没収！
subtitles.english: Pekora and Noel's "Danyin" are confiscated!

subtitles.original: バイバイ～／さようなら。
subtitles.english: Bye bye~ / Goodbye.

subtitles.original: まだまだ挽回のチャンス皆さんありますから。頑張っていきましょう。
subtitles.english: There are still chances to make a comeback. Let's keep working hard.

subtitles.original: それではVTRの続きどうぞ！
subtitles.english: Well then, please continue with the VTR!

subtitles.original: 牛丼ハンターノエルは、但馬牛の肉質をその目で見極めるため…
subtitles.english: Beef bowl hunter Noel, in order to judge the quality of Tajima beef with her own eyes...

subtitles.original: 肉処 たつきさんへと向かいました。
subtitles.english: ...headed to Nikudokoro Tatsuki.

subtitles.original: 今から枝肉を食肉にする作業をご覧いただければと思います。
subtitles.english: I would like you to see the process of turning raw meat into table meat.

subtitles.original: ぜひ見たいです。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: I'd definitely love to see it. Thank you.

subtitles.original: おぉ～すごい！
subtitles.english: Ooh~ Amazing!

subtitles.original: 分厚いお肉がどんどん切られてます。
subtitles.english: The thick meat is being sliced more and more.

subtitles.original: 脂身を削いで、どんどんどんどん滑らかになってる。
subtitles.english: Shaving off the fat, it's becoming smoother and smoother.

subtitles.original: これがプロの手さばき。
subtitles.english: This is professional handiwork.

subtitles.original: 断面図！すごいサシ！
subtitles.english: Cross-section! Amazing marbling!

subtitles.original: 但馬牛が絶賛される理由のひとつ…
subtitles.english: One of the reasons Tajima beef is so highly acclaimed...
